neayirelatedpages-desc: Adds related pages sorted by type at the bottom of the current page
neayirelatedpages-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the NeayiRelatedPages extension.
neayirelatedpages-query+relatedpages-sum: Returns a list of related pages
neayirelatedpages-relatedpages-example: Return related pages for page Agroforesterie
